name: Route 3310 (derboo)
description:
Little pseudo-3D racing game made in a week for Nokia 3310 Jam 3. Finish among the top 3 to make it to the next race. 4 races in total.

CONTROLS

Steering - Left and right arrows

Accelerate - Arrow up / Z / SPACE

Brake - Arrow down / X / SHIFT

Boost - TAB / C
